about_the_game:
Ambrosia - the essence of lust.

You play as Rayne: a waste of space, a layabout and a pervert. She's spent her adult life depending on her supermodel sister, Tayla, for everything from her unhealthy diet to her 24/7 internet addiction.

Rayne's slovenly lifestyle is about to change.

Who will claim the Throne of Eros?

This demo contains the first two chapters of the game, from Rayne's first meeting with the goddess Venus to her confrontation with the fit-and-ferocious champion Nenet.

content_descriptors.notes: Champion of Venus is obviously an adult-only game. It features prolonged, kinky sex scenes at each and every turn.
